title: Clone of the Universe
lyrics:
A future reshape
Time in reverse
Signal from downtown
Clone of the universe
Faceless eyes see
They used it first

Continue to walk by

Clone of the universe



Clone of the universe

Clone of the universe



Millions of faces

Crowd will disperse

Sound is unnerving

Clone of the universe

You are a witness

You can affirm

This time forever

Clone of the universe



Clone of the universe

Clone of the universe



Destroyed minds in this time

Destroyed minds in this time

Destroyed minds in this time

Destroyed minds in this time
